title: Respond to Health Authority Information Request
description: A regulatory specialist has received an information request from the FDA regarding a pending submission and must coordinate the response.

tasks.description: Log the incoming information request and its due date into the regulatory tracking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new record for the request and sets a deadline.

tasks.description: Identify the subject matter experts (SMEs) needed to answer the questions (e.g., from CMC and Clinical departments).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the relevant SMEs based on the request's content.

tasks.description: Assign the questions to the SMEs and track their progress in providing the answers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns tasks to the SMEs and monitors their completion.

tasks.description: Compile the answers into a formal response document and submit it to the FDA before the deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles, formats, and successfully submits the response.
